author: hwright
msg: Merge r38053, r38055, r38057 from trunk:
Do not bail if the ALLUSERPROFILE folder does not exist.
small change without which svn won't work at all on such systems.

author: hwright
msg: Fix issue #3119, "File '...' already exists" when it obviously doesn't,
This was introduced in 1.5.1 and propagated till now.

author: hwright
msg: Fix links generated by the mod_dav_svn directory listing view so they
accurately preserve any revision pegging requested by the user.
The current code can present broken links, causing user confusion.

author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r36331, revert the disabling of SSPI/NTLM authorization,
(SVN_RA_SERF_SSPI_ENABLED): Define this macro, just like before r36331

author: arfrever
msg: * STATUS: Add r38122 to the r38004 group and vote for some revisions.
